trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around April 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm only writing this because I saw alot of reports on here last week of the same thing. I was inside my living room when out of the corner of my eye I saw a very bright flash like lightning, but the instantaneous explosion sound was in no way thunder or even a lightning strike. It was definatly strange.
